text: kya tumane dekha nahin ki allaah raat ko din mein pravisht karata hai aur din ko raat mein pravisht karata hai. usane soory aur chandrama ko kaam mein laga rakha hai? pratyek ek niyat samay tak chala ja raha hai aur isake saath yah ki jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho, allaah usakee pooree khabar rakhata hai
